data.title: Connecting Life to Health
data.text:
Verida is a minority-owned, non-emergency medical transportation (NEMT) management company based in Villa Rica (30 miles west of Atlanta), Georgia. Specializing in the unique challenges of NEMT programs for state Medicaid and managed care organizations, we provide comprehensive NEMT administrative services. This includes call center services; eligibility verification using proven gatekeeping processes; claims management; transportation provider credentialing and monitoring; utilization review; fraud, waste, and abuse mitigation; and quality management.

Backed by over 20 years of NEMT broker experience, Verida currently provides transportation and management services in: • Arkansas • Georgia • Indiana • Louisiana • Mississippi • Tennessee • Washington DC. | Learn more about our new name, Verida. Click here

Verida Volunteers at Summer Art Program for Children in Little Rock, Arkansas

Jun 26, 2024

The Verida Operations team volunteered their time to give back to the Central Arkansas community today. They supported the Dee Brown Library and their Summer Art Program for kids and teenagers between the ages of six and nineteen.

The event titled, Adventures in Art: Paint Balloon Dart Board, gave kids and families the chance to be a little creative, and messy at the same time. Balloons were filled with paint in a variety of colors and attached to a canvas. Kids take aim, and voila, a masterpiece of art is created.

READ MORE

Verida’s Facility Outreach Team Provides Transportation Education to Members in Gainesville, Georgia

June 7, 2024

Verida’s Facility Outreach team continues the 2024 year by providing education and support to expecting mothers in Georgia through the Georgia Department of Community Health’s Baby Shower series for their expecting mothers/members.

This most recent event took place at the Fair Street Neighborhood Center in Gainesville, Georgia. A crowd of up to 50 Medicaid members who are mothers-to-be experienced a delightful lunch, speakers, and organizations like Verida to learn more about resources available to them.

READ MORE

Verida Participates in Annual Arkansas THV11 Summer Cereal Drive

June 5, 2024

Verida’s Arkansas operation had an incredibly special day. In its first year, our team participated in the annual THV11 Summer Cereal Drive. This event comes to Arkansas communities by way of the local TV station, THV11 and the Arkansas Food Bank. The drive took place in North Little Rock today.

The Verida team was stationed right outside the local Walmart to receive as many donations of cereal boxes as possible. This event has a keen focus on overcoming food desserts and ensuring children have cereal to add to their daily nutrition.
